there's too many commands to go into

fortunately we can resolve this using
the second subcommand that I think is

subcommand
this command will tell chat gbt to

understand the expected behavior of our
function and is able to detect and fix

is working as expected the third subc
commmand that I find really awesome is

all we have to do is select the code

this next command took a little while

upon closing the prompt we can see that

following this refactor as well as

something can be one of the 163
